name: Poly Calisto 7200 - Speakerphone hands-free - Bluetooth - wireless - USB | Dell USA
description: When you need exceptional conferencing performance in a small group conference room, turn to Calisto 7200. With four MEMS-directional microphones that provide 360˚ coverage and filter out unwanted noise, USB and Bluetooth connectivity and touch-sensitive controls, it's ready when you are.
